problem.markdown:
>>The postal rate is 25 cents for the first ounce and 20 cents for each additional ounce or part of an ounce. What would it cost to mail a package that weighs 6.8 ounces?<< = 1.45
[explanation] The inital rate plus the additional rate times the weight minus one rounded up.
problem.p: The postal rate is 25 cents for the first ounce and 20 cents for each additional ounce or part of an ounce. What would it cost to mail a package that weighs 6.8 ounces?
